parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  s.date::text,
  json_build_object(
    'time_in_bed_min', s.time_in_bed_min,
    'awake_min', s.awake_min,
    'light_sleep_min', s.light_sleep_min,
    'deep_sleep_min', s.deep_sleep_min,
    'rem_sleep_min', s.rem_sleep_min,
    'sleep_efficiency', s.sleep_efficiency,
    'sleep_consistency', s.sleep_consistency,
    'sleep_performance', s.sleep_performance,
    'sleep_needed_min', s.sleep_needed_min,
    'sleep_debt_min', s.sleep_debt_min,
    'cycles', s.cycles,
    'disturbances', s.disturbances,
    'respiratory_rate', s.respiratory_rate
  ) as sleep,
  json_build_object(
    'recovery_score', r.recovery_score,
    'hrv_rmssd', r.hrv_rmssd,
    'rhr', r.rhr,
    'spo2', r.spo2,
    'skin_temp', r.skin_temp
  ) as recovery
FROM health.whoop_sleep s
LEFT JOIN health.whoop_recovery r ON s.date = r.date
WHERE s.date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '{{ $json.query.days || 7 }} days'
ORDER BY s.date DESC;
